page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT IN BUCHANAN
page.content:
There are a lot of old age pensioners that did work but don't now.In the Milton there are people that work part time but most work full time.Some people go into{Glasgow or Dumbarton}to work but some just work locally.there are some people that are not old age pensioners but do not work.They are just house wives.The people that work part time work round about this area like{Drymen and the Milton.
{WHAT DO THEY DO. Quite a lot of people work on the farms in the area and also quite a lot work part time in shops,hotels,schools or similar work.
